content: today s tutorial is a character inspired by a netflix series called aggretsuko i introduce you to my favorite character retsuko you will need hook n° 2 5 mm and 3 5 mm worsted weight yarn i used el gato expres yellow blue brown white brown light white sport weight yarn for neck part and eyebrows black sport weight yarn for eyes yarn needle stitch marker 2 pipe cleaners scissors pins fiberfill or stuffing of choice
